text: The 2015 San Bernardino shooting was a mass shooting in San Bernardino, California. It started at 10:59 a.m. Pacific Standard Time (PST) on December 2, 2015. At least fourteen people were killed and seventeen were wounded. It happened at the Inland Regional Center. The shooters may have targeted a banquet hosted by San Bernardino County Department of Public Health. The shooters left in an SUV. The two suspected shooters, one woman and one man, Tashfeen Malik and Syed Rizwan Farook, were killed by police during a gunfight. ==References== Category:2015 in California Category:2015 murders in the United States Category:2010s crimes in California Category:December 2015 events Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in 2015 Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the United States Category:Mass murder in California Category:Mass shootings in California Category:Massacres in the United States Category:Murders by firearm in California Category:San Bernardino, California
title: 2015 San Bernardino attack
